titleStmt.title: A lamentable ballad of the tragical end of a gallant lord, and a vertuous lady, with the untimely end of their two children, wickedly performed by a heathenish Blackamoor their servant, the like never heard before. To the tune of, The ladies fall.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and W. Gilbertson.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half-sheet contains: The second part to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
